meanings.definition: A substance added to an adhesive to increase its tackiness.
meanings.sent1: The tackifiers in the glue made it really sticky.
meanings.sent2: I added some tackifiers to the glue to make it stick better.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous elf sprinkled extra tackifiers in the glue, causing it to stick to everything in the workshop.
meanings.sent4: Her words acted as tackifiers, sticking in my mind long after she had left.
meanings.sent5: The tackifiers in the glue were like tiny magnets, pulling things together with ease.

meanings.definition: The tackifiers in the glue helped it stick better.
meanings.sent1: With the tackifiers, the glue held the pieces together firmly.
meanings.sent2: The tackifiers improved the adhesive's ability to stick.
meanings.sent3: The comedian joked that the tackifiers in the glue were so strong, they could even keep his crazy hair in place.
meanings.sent4: His smile was like tackifiers, drawing people towards him effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The tackifiers worked like magic, making the glue bond instantly.
